Name: Tolleytown Punch
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.
Review: A fruity long drink with a dry edge that also works well made in bulk and served from a punch bowl.
History: A drink promoted by Jack Daniel's. Tolleytown lies just down the road from Lynchburg, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Tolleytown Punch contains 176 calories
